error.pagenotfound.title: Kāore tēnei whārangi i te tīariari.
error.pagenotfound.description: Ko te whārangi e rapu ana koe ehara i konei. Kua tirohia e matou i nga wahi katoa engari kaore e kitea
error.pagenotfound.contribute: Mena ka taea e koe te tuhi pukapuka, ka taea e koe te whakatika i tera ma te whakauru ki te kaupapa.
error.servererror.title: Aroha mai. He raruraru
error.servererror.description: Aroha mai, he raruraru kaore e taea te whakaoti i tenei mahi. Kua tukua e matou te kapa kia mohio ai ratou ka whakatika. Na inaianei ka ngana ki te whakaora i te whārangi, ki te hoki ki te whārangi o mua
BeAwesomeSub: Volunteer your time to help the next generation of inventors accomplish epic projects.
AboutUs: Voluntarily is a platform that connects you with classrooms to teach science, technology, engineering, entrepreneurship, arts and design with the help of engaging content supplied by New Zealand’s leading innovators in educational content.
org.detail.title: Organisation
org.list.heading: Organisations
OrgEditPrompt: Tell us something about your organisation and link to your home website.
